botMessages.message: In order to update your health status, I'll ask you a series of health-related questions:
Have you been tested for COVID-19?
Select an Encounter to view:

Hi there, I'm Tracey, a friendly contact tracing chatbot. I am contacting you on behalf of [ORGANIZATION]. I can do things like keep you informed of exposures, help you report encounters, and keep your overall health status up-to-date.
We care about your privacy, so the information you provide will be protected.
.::Main Menu::.
You can call [PHONE NUMBER] to speak directly with a contact tracer.
Alternatively, we can connect you with a contact tracer over chat. Would you like to be connected to a contact tracer?
Goodbye! Click the "End Chat" button to end this chat
Sorry, I didn't understand that.
Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment
The action failed with error: {!ErrorText}
I'm sorry, it doesn't look like we could locate your person record. Please contact your system administrator to get you enrolled in this service.
I'm sorry. You could not enroll in this contact tracing service. Please contact your system administrator to re-enroll. Error Code: {!EnrolleeOutcome}
To use this contact tracing service, you must accept the terms below:
{!ConsentText}
Thank you for accepting the contact tracing terms.
Please take your temperature now, and respond with the device reading in Fahrenheit (ie 98.6)
Thanks. We've recorded your daily temperature of {!VTemperature}*F.
What was your test result?
Are you experiencing symptoms of COVID-19?
Have you had contact with someone who is symptomatic or who has tested positive for COVD-19?
We'd like to collect information on people you've had contact with, particularly during business hours or while performing work-related activities.
First, respond with a name that describes a gathering you've had in the past 14 days where you've had sustained close contact with others (for example, "Strategy Meeting", or "Lunch")
Thanks. Now reply with the date and time "{!Encounter_Title}" occurred on (ie "July 12 2020 at 2:30PM")?
Ok. Respond with the number of minutes this gathering lasted.
Last, respond with the approximate number of participants in this gathering.
Thanks I've logged your encounter. Now, lets add any coworkers or external contacts who were present at it...
You do not have any known encounters at this time.
Please respond with a comma separated list of work email addresses associated with coworkers who were present at "{!Encounter.Name}". Reply BACK to cancel.
Please respond with a contact email address for the external contact
I found {!ExternalLead.FirstName} {!ExternalLead.LastName} and added them to the encounter.
This looks like a new external contact. Please reply with just their FIRST NAME
Now reply with their LAST NAME
Finally, reply with their COMPANY NAME
I created contact "{!ExternalLead.FirstName} {!ExternalLead.LastName}" and added them to the encounter.
You will now receive notifications about contact tracing.
You will no longer receive notifications about contact tracing. You can always text back to re-enable notifications.
You will now receive notifications about a daily virtual temperature check for the next 14 days.
You will no longer receive daily virtual temperature check reminders. You can always text back to re-enable this.
You seem to be experiencing a fever. We've recorded your temperature, but would now like to update your health status....
Thank you for accepting the contact tracing terms.
Thanks. Based on your answers, we don't have to trace your contacts. If your condition changes, please return to this thread and reply "TRACE" to update your health status.
My health status: {!HealthStatus}
Would you like to be reminded about a daily virtual temperature check for the next 14 days?
